Moderators module

modController.add_mod()

Add a new moderator.

This endpoint allows the addition of a new moderator by providing a username and password.

Returns:

JSON response containing moderator details or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

modController.delete_mod(id)

Delete a moderator.

This endpoint allows the deletion of a moderator by specifying their user ID.

Parameters:

id (int) – The ID of the moderator to be deleted.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

modController.get_mod(id)

Get a specific moderator.

This endpoint retrieves details of a specific moderator by specifying their user ID.

Parameters:

id (int) – The ID of the moderator to be retrieved.

Returns:

JSON response containing moderator details or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

modController.get_mods()

Get all moderators.

This endpoint retrieves a list of all moderators.

Returns:

JSON response containing a list of moderators or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

modController.modify_mod()

Modify a moderator.

This endpoint allows the modification of a moderator’s details by specifying their user ID, and providing the updated username and/or password.

Returns:

JSON response containing updated moderator details or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response
